alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 22 at 3:36PM AKDT until October 23 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds. Mixed snow and rain. Additional snow accumulations of 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could cause damage to buildings and blow away lose items. Power lines could be damaged. Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
